00015 - (id)initWithFrame:( NSRect )frame andData:( NSArray* )data startingWith:(enum kRSStarter) starter andX:( CGFloat ) xW ofType:(enum kRSType) type
00016 {
00017     self = [super initWithFrame:frame];
00018     if ( self ) 
00019         {
00020         [self setXWidth:xW];
00021                 [self setStartingElement:starter];
00022                 _pattern = [[NSArray alloc] initWithArray:data];
00023                 [self setDrawPoint:NSMakePoint( 0, 0 )];
00024                 [self setTheType:type];
00025     }
00026     return self;
00027 }
00028 
00029 - (void)drawRect:(NSRect)dirtyRect
00030 {
00031     for ( int rr = 0; rr < _pattern.count; rr++ ) 
00032         {
00033                 CGFloat element_width = _xWidth * [[_pattern objectAtIndex:rr] intValue];
00034                 NSRect element = NSMakeRect( _drawPoint.x, _drawPoint.y, element_width, self.frame.size.height );
00035                 int loop_modulus = rr % 2;
00036                 if ( _theType == 2 ) 
00037                 {
00038                         [[NSColor clearColor] set];
00039                 } 
00040                 else 
00041                 {
00042                         switch ( _startingElement ) 
00043                         {
00044                                 case 1:
00045                                         if ( loop_modulus == 0 ) 
00046                                         {
00047                                                 [[NSColor clearColor] set];
00048                                         }
00049                                         if ( loop_modulus == 1) 
00050                                         {
00051                                                 [[NSColor blackColor] set];
00052                                         }
00053                                         break;
00054                                 case 0:
00055                                         if ( loop_modulus == 0 ) 
00056                                         {
00057                                                 [[NSColor blackColor] set];
00058                                         }
00059                                         if ( loop_modulus == 1) 
00060                                         {
00061                                                 [[NSColor clearColor] set];
00062                                         }
00063                                         break;
00064                                 default:
00065                                         break;
00066                         }
00067                 }               
00068                 NSRectFill( element );
00069                 _drawPoint.x += element_width;
00070         }
00071 }
